vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.9;
son of: Shaharaim (H7842) and Hodesh (H2321);
brother of: Jobab (H3103J), Mesha (H4331), Malcam (H4445A), Jeuz (H3263), Sachia (H7634), Mirmah (H4821), Abitub (H0036) and Elpaal (H0508)
§ Zibia = "roe"
a Benjamite, son of Shaharaim by wife Hodesh
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Saharaim; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗比雅
1) 便雅憫人沙哈連和其妻賀得所生的兒子之一 #代上 8:9|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗比雅
1) 便雅悯人沙哈连和其妻贺得所生的儿子之一 #代上 8:9|
